item.title: Italy Cracks Down on Sweatshops Supplying Armani and Dior
item.description: For a decade, a Chinese tailor toiled in a three-story building on the outskirts of Milan, working 13 hours a day making high-end garments for brands including Italian cashmere label Loro Piana.
